name: SolarGainPressLowDelay
comment: Parameter: Set TRUE for LP delay in case of solar gain

name: HwcLegioProtectionMaxTimer
comment: Maximal time the legio protection state is hold (indepent of reached temperature)

name: HwcLoadingRequest
comment: Flag: Loading request to the energy manager for DHW

name: HwcLoadingEnabled
comment: Flag: Loading enabled by the energy manager

name: ActualTempDesired
comment: Current tank setpoint. Depends on the programmed period and current time, operating mode …

name: HwcLegioTempOkTimer
comment: Time for which the temperature for legio protection should be hold

name: QuickVetoTempDesired
comment: DHW setpoint in case of quick veto

name: ManualStorageTempDesired
comment: DHW setpoint in case of manual mode

name: HwcTempOffset
comment: Offset between desired temperature and setpoint

name: HwcLoadingHysteresis
comment: Parameter: Hysteresis for DHW tank loading, if there is no special hysteresis (legionella, frost protection...).
